title: Phase 2: Lazy OCR + vision workers
description: Python OCR worker polls frames WHERE vision_status = 0, runs Tesseract or LLM vision, updates ocr_text/vision_summary

title: Channel-based capture pipeline
description: Separate capture from storage with an async channel. Capture thread sends frames; storage task receives and persists. Prevents slow saves from stalling capture.

title: Python OCR worker
description: Worker polls frames WHERE vision_status = 0. Runs Tesseract OCR. Updates ocr_text table and sets has_text flag. Existing LLM clients in agents/llm_api/ are working.

title: LLM vision summarization worker
description: Worker polls frames WHERE vision_status = 0 (or after OCR). Sends frame to LLM vision API for summarization. Updates vision_summary column.

title: Create PR: screenpipe removal + clean architecture
description: Branch claude/screen-pipe-upstream-analysis-KAKGU has 5 commits ready. Create the PR for review.

title: Phase 1: Performance hardening
description: spawn_blocking for JPEG encoding, concurrent monitor capture, channel-based pipeline. Phase 1 capture is functionally complete but needs perf work.

title: Phase 2: Lazy OCR + vision workers
description: Python OCR worker polls frames WHERE vision_status = 0, runs Tesseract or LLM vision, updates ocr_text/vision_summary. Server-side async processing.

title: Phase 3: Hierarchical summaries
description: Frame clusters → Activity summaries → Project summaries → Day summaries. Core drill-down UX: 'What did I do Thursday?' Tables activities, projects, day_summaries.

title: Phase 4: HTTP POST ingestion (multi-machine)
description: API server on Postgres host. Capture clients POST frames instead of direct Postgres. Memory buffer + retry for network resilience. Enables laptop/desktop/work PC feeding same server.

title: Phase 5: Memory agents (MIRIX)
description: Wire existing MIRIX agents to consume from frames/summaries. 6 memory types: Episodic, Semantic, Procedural, Resource, Knowledge Vault, Core. Blocker: needs migration from org/user to deployment_id.

title: Phase 6: Secrets & encryption
description: Secret detection via pattern matching + LLM review. FIDO2 hardware key encryption. Secrets table exists in schema.

title: Use spawn_blocking for JPEG encoding
description: JPEG encode is synchronous and blocks the tokio runtime. Wrap in spawn_blocking.

title: Concurrent multi-monitor capture
description: Currently captures monitors sequentially. Spawn concurrent tasks per monitor for lower latency.
